issue.body:
### Description

When creating an access token, click permission, no options are listed any more.

![图片](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1bcdb939-6e6b-4474-afce-f832ec454f6e)


### Gitea Version

df7f1c2ead

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

Yes

_No response_

localhost dev env

body:
I came across the following warning:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0fd5ba62-ad73-486a-a603-7c713a21237a)

~~I found this comment: https://github.com/fengyuanchen/vue-feather/issues/8#issuecomment-1566422206~~
~~it works for me, but I am not sure if this is the correct solution.~~

> I came across the following warning: ![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/33891828/357005040-0fd5ba62-ad73-486a-a603-7c713a21237a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Wm8PaV4Cxfxm1mAQG-dFHwDXFa30BKJ2qTrG70hayX8)
> 
> I found this comment: [fengyuanchen/vue-feather#8 (comment)](https://github.com/fengyuanchen/vue-feather/issues/8#issuecomment-1566422206) it works for me, but I am not sure if this is the correct solution.

Looks like it's a better solution for me.
